Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier sick customer on a train. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier sick customer on a train.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
